channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jussie Smollett’s conviction in 2019 attack on himself is overturned
item.description: The Illinois Supreme Court has overturned actor Jussie Smollett’s conviction on charges that he staged a racist and homophobic attack against himself in 2019 and lied to Chicago police.

item.title: M. Jodi Rell, who became Connecticut governor after running mate resigned, dies at 78
item.description: Republican Former Connecticut Gov. M. Jodi Rell has died at age 78. She took over the office to become the second female governor in state history after her running mate resigned.

item.title: Shohei Ohtani likely to win his third MVP award and Aaron Judge his second
item.description: Shohei Ohtani is expected to win his third Most Valuable Player Award and first in the National League, and Aaron Judge is likely to earn his second AL honor when the Baseball Writers’ Association announces its balloting.
